howToStart.question: How can I start using BitcoinPay?
howToStart.answer: After completing identity verification with a government-issued ID from your country of residence, your card will be issued immediately.

cost.question: How much does it cost to open an account?

tax.question: Is there a tax calculation feature?
tax.answer: Currently, this feature is not available. However, we plan to implement tax processing features tailored to each country's tax system in future updates.

currencies.question: Which cryptocurrencies are supported?
currencies.answer: Currently, we support USDC and USDT. We plan to add support for Bitcoin SV, ETH, Solana, MATIC, and BSC in the future.

security.question: How secure is BitcoinPay?
security.answer: We use enterprise-grade security measures to protect your funds and personal information. Your assets remain in self-custody.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using BitcoinPay services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: BitcoinPay provides a virtual credit card service that allows users to spend cryptocurrency (USDC/USDT) for everyday purchases through Apple Pay and Google Pay.

eligibility.title: 3. User Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old and capable of forming a binding contract to use our services. You must complete identity verification (KYC) before accessing card services.

responsibilities.title: 4. User Responsibilities
items: Provide accurate and complete information during registration
Maintain the security of your account credentials
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
Not use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose

fees.title: 5. Fees and Charges
fees.content: Account creation is free. Transaction fees and other charges may apply and will be disclosed before any transaction is completed.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: BitcoinPay shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the service.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of any material changes.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our contact form.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
items: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
Government-issued identification documents for KYC verification
Transaction and payment information
Device and usage information

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process transactions and send related information
Verify your identity and prevent fraud
Comply with legal obligations
Communicate with you about products, services, and events

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:
items: Service providers who assist in our operations
Regulatory authorities when required by law
Partners with your consent

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access your personal information
Correct inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data
Object to processing of your data
Data portability

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected and to comply with legal obligations.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your browsing activities and to provide you with a better experience.

policyChanges.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our contact form.
